DESCRIPTION: When using a Weapon card with the name attached, will get the attribute provided by the card.The maximum number of equipment is 1.
Each time you play a weapon card, the number of layers of weapon is reduced by 1.
choose: if you already have a Weapon, fix and upgrade corresponding weapons; otherwise, replace the attribute provided by the weapon before removing it;Or deal damage/gain block.

According to the type of Weapon, the effect is added. NL Sword:attack,apply 1 Weak;skill:gain 1 entanglePower;power:gain 1 EnergizedPower. NL Crossbow:attack,Apply 2 poison;skill:discard and drawcard;power,attack myself 1 damage. NL Shield:attack:gain 1 poison;skill:Gain 2 Block;power:gain 1 metallicizePower. NL Spear:attack,Apply 1 Vulnerable;skill:doesn`t draw card this round;power:draw 1 card

Gain 1 more Strength per BrokenSword`s level .
Gain 1 more Strength per GanJiangMoYe`s level .The first target you use each round is the enemy's attack card will be repeated N times.(N=GanJiangMoYe`s level)
Gain 1 more Strength per BloodthirstySword`s level .After using attack card，Restores the damage N/6 times the health.(N=BloodthirstySword`s level)
Gain 1 more Strength per Excalibur`s level .Start every turn, gain N TheContractOfVictory.(N=Excalibur`s level)
Depending on the type of weapon card used, get the effect.attack,Apply 2 poison;skill:discard and drawcard;power,attack myself 1 damage.
Gain 1 more Strength per BrokenCrossbow`s level .
Gain 3 more Strength per Hrunting`s level .Apply N Weak after using attack card.(N=Hrunting`s level)

Gain 1 more Dexterity per BrokenShield`s level .
Gain 1 more Dexterity per ExplosiveArmor`s level .Gain 3 more Thorns per ExplosiveArmor`s level.
Gain 1 more Dexterity per RhoAias`s level .Gain Barricade. Each RhoAias`s level reduce 3 damage
Depending on the type of weapon card used, get the effectattack,Apply 1 Vulnerable;skill:doesn`t draw card this round;power:draw 1 card.
Gain 1 more Strength per BrokenSpear`s level .
Gain 1 more Strength per GaeBolgBolg`s level .Each GaeBolgBolg`s level apply 2 ImprintOfDeath after using attack card.
Gain 1 more Strength per GaeBolg`s level .Each GaeBolg`s level gain 1 Metalization after using attack card.
At the end of the battle, each TheContractOfVictory adds 1 health response and maximum health.But the max of TheContractOfVictory is 10.

The damage caused by the uncommon card or the block gained increased by 3, while the damage caused by the common card or the block gained decreased by 3.
Rare cards cause twice as much damage or gain blocks ,but common cards cause 1/2 less damage or gain blocks.(downward alignment)

The next attack deals 1 more damage per ImprintOfDeath.1 ImprintOfDeath is removed at end of turn.When the turn starts, if the ImprintOfDeath`s layer is greater than 10, give 50 fixed damage. Then remove all the ImprintOfDeath.
